QuestData.Title: Sasha's Hunt
QuestData.Description: This thing... this curse... that's affecting Silverbrook and Solstice Village... it makes beasts out of people.$B$BMy father tried to warn them, but they all listened to the wolfcult instead.$B$BThey're too far gone now, it's time to put them down... for their own sake.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sasha wants you to kill 12 Solstice Hunters in Solstice Village.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you taken care of the hunters in the village yet, $n?
QuestData.RewardText: Killing these monsters won't bring my father back... but that's not the point now, is it?
